sub_title: Brand Program Manager at Booking.com | AgilePM® Certified, Web Content Management Expert
summary:
A creative operations manager with 12 years of experience coordinating global multimedia projects, campaigns and strategic content for a variety of international companies including G-Star RAW, Lightspeed Commerce, Booking.com, Microsoft and Nokia.

Specialities: Project Management, Content Management, Stakeholder Management, Content Marketing, Copywriting, Photography, Design, Adobe CS5, Social Media Management, Global Image Library Management, Web Content Management, Brochure/Flyer/Invitation Design, Fluent German, advanced Dutch, advanced French, basic Spanish, basic Italian.

treasury_media.title: Project Management: G-Star RAW Visual Content
treasury_media.description: As Visual Content Manager at G-Star RAW, I managed the high-volume production of thousands of product images and videos, aligned with global and regional G-Star RAW fashion campaigns.  I worked in partnership with a wide range of stakeholders and teams (e.g. photography studios, stylists, photographers, designers, social media, brand, product, marketing and PR) to showcase the very best of what G-Star RAW has to offer our customer base around the globe.

treasury_media.title:
Project Management: 
Booking.com #expandhorizons
treasury_media.description: A career at Booking.com offers the chance to challenge yourself, challenge your perceptions and, very occasionally, challenge AI to a game of ping pong.

treasury_media.title: Project Management: Booking.com Perspectives Series
treasury_media.description: The Perspectives series highlighted a number of employee stories from around the world. Working alongside the team’s video producer, I managed the vendor relationship and budgeting/contracting with Studio Weekend to ensure consistency and delivery, while the producer focused on creative output.

treasury_media.title: Project Management: Amsterdam Tech City - The Place
treasury_media.description: Amsterdam is fast becoming the centre for technology in Europe. And at its beating heart is a company that has been revolutionising travel for more than 20 years – Booking.com.

treasury_media.title:
Project Management: 
Booking.com Articles Blog
treasury_media.description:
As photography project coordinator at Booking.com, I coordinated a team of global photo editors to source and edit multimedia content for use across all Booking.com sites. 

One of my main projects was booking.com/articles, a travel inspiration microsite, for which I developed a content strategy and digital asset management library (DAM) to facilitate the sourcing of thousands of high-quality images across the site.

treasury_media.title: Online Portfolio: jimwilson.co.uk
treasury_media.description: A selection of recent projects and content development.

treasury_media.title:
Personal Blog
brunchesandcoffees.com
treasury_media.description: Welcome to Brunches+Coffees, a guide to some of the best food and drink around the globe.

contributors.headline: Brand Program Manager at Booking.com | AgilePM® Certified, Web Content Management Expert

profile_positions.description:
RESPONSIBILITIES

Support with short and long-term planning of Brand and Content Agency team projects aligned with Company, Marketing and Brand objectives.

Maintain a high level of quality standards/outcomes among projects in personal portfolio

Role model professional project management for key stakeholders and ensure transparency, structure and efficiency in running their projects on day-to-day basis

Coordinate together with other PMO leaders within Marketing department (Business Marketing, Performance Marketing, Brand Creative & Production, Content Agency) to ensure consistency in methodology and alignment for large multi-departmental initiatives

Ensure all owned projects are delivered on-time, within scope and within budget to defined client specifications and quality standard

Scope, plan and deliver projects with limited/medium complexity independently; ability to run multiple project concurrently

Professional, clear and timely communication with stakeholders and Agency dependents on progress, blocks and problem-solving

Enable project sponsors to make quality decisions by providing relevant quantitative and qualitative data to drive decision making

Measure project performance using appropriate systems, tools and techniques

Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation for reporting purposes

Perform risk management to minimize project risks. Flag issues and propose solutions

Establish and maintain relationships with Content team members, other stakeholders, as well as third parties/vendors as needed
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager, Brand & Content Agency

profile_positions.description:
www.brunchesandcoffees.com 
www.instagram.com/brunchesandcoffees
www.twitter.com/brunchescoffees

Established new website to showcase a range of popular cafes and restaurants

Combination of my own photography and copywriting

Continuation of digital content creation following global restructure at Microsoft

Established social media sites on Twitter and Instagram

Short and long copy creation for web and social media channels

Promotion of web content across social media channels
profile_positions.title: Founder & Editor

profile_positions.description:
RESPONSIBILITIES

Setting up the visual content strategy for G-Star Raw, working together with internal stakeholders to gather input and data to define which visual content is needed when and where (focus on photography and video).

Building a cross-functional Content Hub that helps with visual content distribution across global channels and regional markets.

Creating and distributing clear content schedules / calendars to assure a continuous steam of content

Lead content requests into large / small-scale productions.

Set clear content guidelines and usage rights.

Be a driving force for innovation in the content space in order to ensure G-Star is constantly relevant to consumers and target audience.

Leverage a smart, data driven approach to content by defining clear KPIs that ensure results with a measurable impact.

ACHIEVEMENTS

Management and refinement of webshop photography workflows and vendor processes

Creation of new workflows between marketing and ecom teams to facilitate landing page and webshop asset display across global webshop pages.

Establishing clear budget management and spend visibility for management and stakeholders

Creation of central project overview to provide clarity on tasks, priorities and status for brand and webshop team
profile_positions.title: Visual Content Manager

profile_positions.description:
RESPONSIBILITIES

Support the Customer Experience Design leadership team and 35+ design and content specialists, with overall project management of global design projects across NORAM, EU, AU offices

Management of 4 senior designers 

Intake job requests, review for completeness, prioritise, and distribute tasks to design staff based on the requirements of the project and available resources

Establish clear communication and new ways of working across the team due to shift in office/remote working environment

Assist in project management and oversee design timelines to ensure deadlines are met

Track each project as it routes through the creative process ensuring that the design system and templates are followed, and UX/customer experience is prioritised

Ensure all artwork routes through the approval process and all approvals are received while maintaining the project timeline

Collaborate with local and regional/remote members of content, design, hardware, research and development teams

Communicate to design staff as project requirements and key components of projects evolve

Serve as first step of the internal review process, checking for quality and accuracy in both written / visual work

Work with Product Development, Program Management and Brand teams across multiple company verticals to continually improve creative workflow process, user experience and design system adoption and documentation

Edit and maintain department Confluence site

ACHIEVEMENTS

Established centralised GDrives for files and Slack channels for improved collaboration

Sunsetted older tools (e.g. Abstract/Invision/Sketch) and implemented design-specific tools for team and cross-company collaboration (e.g. Monday.com/Figma/Miro/Geekbot/Frontify)

Improved design intake process for company verticals, resulting in increased visibility on project planning and reduction in last-minute stakeholder requests

Established global budget management tracking/reporting process
profile_positions.title: Design Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
Team awarded 2019 LinkedIn Best Employer Brand NL (10,000+ employees)
Organise, traffic and monitor projects, campaigns and events across key global markets 
Project management of global EVP #expandhorizons brand campaign and additional short/long-term multimedia campaigns (c.100m reach) across multiple markets in partnership with marketing and production teams from MediaMonks, Verizon Media, Mindshare, ThirtyThree, Universum
Operational lead to team of 8 across digital marketing, video production, photo, copy and events functions
Management of Global Events Specialist to enhance output, support and oversee work
Strategy development in key global Tech/CS markets to enhance and drive recruitment of core roles
Global budget tracking and vendor management, liaising with key stakeholders, procurement and finance team
Global recruitment event management and strategy development  (e.g.MeetUps/WIT/WebSummit/TNW/PyData)
Development and promotion of global recruitment events via landing pages and social media content
Development of centralised branded digital asset management (DAM) platform for global teams
Project management of WeChat, LinkedIn, Glassdoor profile refreshes across multiple languages/markets
profile_positions.title: Global Project Manager, Employer Brand

profile_positions.description:
World’s #1 travel accommodation site with 1m+ properties in 225 countries and territories
Visual Content project management across Booking.com web, social media and marketing channels
Manage 10 photo editors across APAC, EMEA & NORAM
Internal & external stakeholder management
Maintain and develop relationships with external image clients (e.g. Getty Images, 500px & Bynder)
Creation of internal presentations and briefing materials for key stakeholders
Management of internal image library (c.90k images)
Content publishing across blogs, social media and web (c.30m visitors)
Management of global freelance property photography projects
Working alongside content, copy and marketing teams to source appropriate licensed photography
Events management of global team photography summits
Development of team best practices and processes aligned with wider brand strategies
profile_positions.title: Project Coordinator, Visual Content

(Microsoft/Nokia merger. Global restructure in Summer 2015)

RESPONSIBILITIES 
High-volume image editing working to tight deadlines and quick turnaround times
Global image library management for apps, marketing, advertising, packaging and agencies
Created photographic wallpapers for global operators including Verizon, AT&T and China Mobile

Art-direction of individual photography shoots in Iceland and Spain
Copywriting for internal/external projects, apps, books, briefs and presentations
Press release creation and distribution

Worked directly with photographers and colleges in USA, Finland, China, Africa and UK
Promoted photography via SM channels and global #shotonmylumia marketing campaign
Created and edited multimedia content for global Nokia and Microsoft SM channels
Created and edited video to increased college project participation (10k YouTube hits) 
New college relationships established, new markets for projects identified
Managed press coverage of Future Creatives project 
Scouted new locations for projects

profile_positions.title: Content Editor & Photographer

profile_positions.description:
RESPONSIBILITIES

Managed & promoted events, services and charity campaigns to 20,000+ students, online & print

Managed photographers, designers, travel arrangements, budgets, deadlines & advertising sales

Implemented social media strategy to engage more students with organisation

Web editor of www.glasgowstudent.net, Google Analytics management

Designed, produced and printed flyers/posters/Annual Report/Student Handbook/Student Diary

Managed 4 multi-platform, award-winning student media teams (TV/Radio/Print)

Created, promoted and managed GUSRC online social media sites, forums, podcasts and RSS 

Promoted Glasgow student life to national media organisations (e.g. BBC, The Herald, The Times)

Created & distributed proactive and reactive press releases to support campaigns and events

Attended open days to promote student life to prospective students of Glasgow University

Regular contact, pitching and interaction with Glasgow University management & external clients

ACHIEVEMENTS

Organised week-long Media Week with talks and workshops by leading TV/Radio/Print journalists

Developed Freshers’ Week content to provide more real-time info across web/SM for students

Established new SM channels to enable seamless engagement between students and GUSRC

Managed website redesign and improved accessibility of information for students

20% increase in turnout at student elections, students able to tweet to candidates for first time

18% increase in Freshers’ Week pass sales

GUSRC now able to communicate directly in real-time with students about welfare weeks, campaigns, news and events across Facebook/Twitter/YouTube instead of solely via email
